scenario_description: A severe interest rate shock with a +200bps parallel shift across all tenors, accompanied by a widening of credit spreads.
A severe interest rate shock with a +200bps parallel shift across all tenors, accompanied by a widening of credit spreads.
A severe credit spread shock with a +200bps widening across all corporate credit spreads, accompanied by a moderate interest rate shock.
A severe credit spread shock with a +200bps widening across all corporate credit spreads, accompanied by a moderate interest rate shock.
A severe FX rate shock with a -20% multiplicative change in the EURCHF exchange rate, accompanied by a moderate widening of credit spreads.
A severe FX rate shock with a -20% multiplicative change in the EURCHF exchange rate, accompanied by a moderate widening of credit spreads.
